page.title: 07Employment
page.content: Of the 80 employable men and women in the LINDEAN area 37 are engaged in agriculture either as farmers, agricultural workers or contractors or as the wives of such.The remainder, including 17 in service occupations, are employed as follows: Nurse 5, Teacher 4 Artist /craftworker 4,Millworker 3 Factory-worker 3, Motor mechanic 2 Solicitor 1, Doctor 1 Ship's Officer 1, Builder 1 Engineer 1. Services:Security 2 Clerk 2 Shop assistant 2, Handyman 2 Domestic 1, Child Minder 1 Janitor 1, Labourer 1 Housewife 5. Only one resident (at present), formerly a deep sea diver,is unemployed.
